description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## Details
### Tender Reference Number
- **Reference Number**: PW-23-01030864
- **Solicitation Number**: W8482-231429/A

### Tender Details
- **Title**: NSN 20-0041495 SEAL KIT
- **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
- **Procurement Category**: *GD (Government Department)
- **Trade Agreements**: *Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- **Regions of Opportunity**: *World
- **Regions of Delivery**: *Nova Scotia and British Columbia

### Background Information
The Department of National Defence is seeking procurement of Seal KIT under the NSN 20-0041495. Two items are required:

- **Item 1**: Seal KIT (GSIN: N5845, NSN: 20-0041495)
  - Part Number: 113700
  - Quantity: 4 units
  - Unit of Issue: KT
  - Delivery Location: CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia
- **Item 2**: Seal KIT (GSIN: N5845, NSN: 20-0041495)
  - Part Number: 113700
  - Quantity: 5 units
  - Unit of Issue: KT
  - Delivery Location: CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia

### Tender Requirements
- **Tender Description**: The Crown retains the rights to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
- **Language**: Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
- **Currency**: Bids must be submitted in Canadian dollars. Bids submitted in foreign currency will be rejected.
- **Preferential Treatment**: A preference is given to Canadian goods and/or services.

### Tender Submission Details
- **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-04-11T14:00:00
- **Tender Status**: Expired
- **Notice URL**: Not available
- **Tender Attachments**: Available at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/03/27/2c18d3bc7f86e841c636a69a930048e2/w8482-231429_-_rfp_-_en.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/03/27/2c18d3bc7f86e841c636a69a930048e2/w
